question: Based on the library borrowing chart, which book category had the highest borrowing volume in Week 4?

options.A: Fiction books had the highest volume
options.B: Non-fiction books had the highest volume
options.C: Reference books had the highest volume
options.D: Cannot be determined due to scale issues

explanation: The chart uses an inappropriate scale range (1000-3200) that starts well above zero, making it difficult to accurately compare the relative borrowing volumes. While Fiction books do have the highest volume (1400), the truncated scale makes Non-fiction books appear to have the largest volume, potentially misleading viewers about the actual differences between categories.
